website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, quick-drying water shoes that offer enough support for land as well.
pros: Mesh design makes these shoes dry quickly
Rubber sole offers enough support to keep your foot comfortable while walking
Available in a wide variety of colors
cons: Sand and small pebbles can get stuck in the mesh, but are easy to wash out
The laces are decorative only – they don't tighten the shoes

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Footwear!
customer_reviews.text: Needed some water shoes for an upcoming vacation. Purchased quite a few to try on. I have very picky feet so it is always a challenge. These water shoes made the cut. They also passed with flying colors on our water adventures. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Staheli

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly. Looked great and very comfortable for walking
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Simply put they exceeded my expectations. I knew I was going to need a good pair of water shoes for a shore excursion we had purchased on our cruise, but also needed comfortable tennis shoes for when we were not doing the water activities. These were perfect since they are built like tennis shoes but are made to get wet. And they’re cute too. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JZamora

customer_reviews.title: Winners
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 in shoes and size up to 8.5 in athletic shoes. Since these are to be worn without socks, I purchased the 8 and they fit true to size. I did notice the scratchiness in the top of the shoe that other reviewers mentioned, however that didn't last long. Wore these on a cruise and excursions. AWESOME! Definitely recommend and would re-purchase if I had to. EXTREMELY comfortable
customer_reviews.author: SWiliams

customer_reviews.title: Super cute boat/water shoes! Very breathable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sailing the BVIs in two weeks and needed boat shoes (white bottom) that I can also wear while swimming to/from shore. These are perfect! I purchased the purple shoe with orange accents and they are even cuter than I was expecting. I can tell they will dry fast--you feel air flow through every time you step. These shoes run true to your typical shoe size--I were a US10 in women's and these fit perfect. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf

customer_reviews.title: Grommets on eyelets rust!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are easy to put on a great for aqua aerobics. I would have given them 5 stars had the grommets around the eyelets not starting rusting. I can't believe they would use metal and not plastic on something that is meant to be submerged in water. How disappointing! I certainly was not planning to have to buy another pair of water shoes 60 days after I bought these. Unfortunately for this reason I would not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a cruise. I thought they were a little too loose when I tried them on (you cannot tighten the laces) but they were perfect!!! Very comfortable, wore on trails for cave tubing and on the beach. My boyfriend has the matching pair!! They are so comfortable I wore them in FL as daily shoes once we got off the ship.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fager

customer_reviews.title: Great for river hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the price but was in desperate need of some shoes for river hiking at Zion National Park at the Narrows and I knew I would rarely use them so I just went for a cheap one and these worked great! Some rocks did get inside my shoes and started to hurt my toes, but that could've been solved by just buying the shoes with no holes. I never slipped or fell down and even hiked in waist deep and still held up!
customer_reviews.author: blackjackxxi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after a month
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these, I am outdoors weekly, pretty much every weekend. At forest I was very happy with the water shoes. They fit great and worked for what I bought them for, boating. After only using them for about a month on the weekends I was so disappointed to see them discoloring same rusting. I wanted them off south clean water and set them to dry so that they would last but the metal used isn't salt water friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa B

customer_reviews.title: Great river shoes! Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable!! Perfect for the rocks in the bottom of the river! They stay on well and don't slip even while running or jumping off of higher cliffs! Highly recommend! Got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: AC1214

customer_reviews.title: Rust staining after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were fine at first but sadly developed rust stains at the eyelets nearly immediately, despite the fact that I rinsed them with fresh water and set them out to dry after using them right away. The stains do not impact the functionality of the shoes but make them look pretty ugly. These shoes are advertised specifically as water shoes and the price implied that the quality would be acceptable. Well, sadly apparently I can’t even return them! Definitely a waste of money. Should have picked up a $10 pair at Walmart instead.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe would be fine for light water activity - kayaking in sandy areas, walking on the beach, etc. I purchased these prior to a trip to Zion NP and used them in the Narrows. They were woefully inadequate and really hampered my experience. The problem is that they are extremely flimsy (you can easily fold each shoe in half) and they simply cannot hold up to stepping on rocks or uneven surfaces. The rocks go right up into your foot and cause it to hyperextend. They’re cheap, and you get what you pay for! If you’ll be navigating rocks with your water, do yourself a favor and spring for something with a rigid sole.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title, decent water shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but I expected these shoes to be fast drying on your feet. I work in a very damp environment where only sometimes my shoes get wet. (This damp environment is outside in the sun and heat) And my feet stayed wet the whole time, they only dry quick when you don't wear them. It caused me to have quite a few blisters and took two weeks for my feet to be normal with a lot of maintenance I also got a rock stuck in them and to dig it out with a pen.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for water aerobics and they work great for that. They look and feel just like a pair of tennis shoes. They dry quickly after getting out of the water. The soul insert does not slide around when i work out, and that's a BIG plus. I had to remove 1 star for the rough texture on the inside of the shoe. The soul is even textured and is a little too rough for my taste. I was afraid that the texture would give me blisters, but I haven't experienced them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja G

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes, not so great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for a trip to Costa Rica. We went on a long, strenuous hike throughout the rain forest and were climbing a LOT and threading through water. I read several reviews prior, so I thought these would work. I ordered a 6.5 & I usually wear a 6.5-7 in tennis shoes. While these fit me walking around the house, when we got down and dirty, my toes were hurting!! The back of my ankle began rubbing a blister within a half hour of the hike. I love the look of these shoes; however I wouldn't recommend for anything more than an easy hike. It seems these would do better for canoeing, kayaking, the ocean, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Handy for pools and lakes
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and ordered a little larger than I might have. If I put orthodics in the shoes it fits better, but that would ruin the orthodic, so I won't be doing that.. There is no support of any kind in this shoe, so if you have plantar fasciitis you'll notice. The shoe entirely mesh except for the soles. Having said that I bought these shoes for a specific purpose of walking in and around a pool. These shoes are perfect for that . They dry very quickly and ready to use again.. I would not wear them for everyday use, but if you buy them for the lake or pool you will like them..
customer_reviews.author: JC Cats

customer_reviews.title: Water drains pretty well but a lot of sand does get in
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on Lake Michigan beach. Water drains pretty well but a lot of sand does get in. Cleaning was not easy in terms of getting the sand out but the removable insole did make it somewhat easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Newburger

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on and ended up walking around the house in them for hours and realized I was still wearing the shoes. Very comfortable, it kinda feels like your walking on a trampoline its very strange but feels so good. I bought these for an upcoming cruise, I am looking forward to using these as double duty port walking shoes and water shoes. I loved them so much I had to send the link to my friend I'm going with on the cruise, we both have wide feet and these stretch perfectly for that purpose. I have not tried them in water yet but, I cant see me having any issues! I may buy another color too!
customer_reviews.author: Kearuh

customer_reviews.title: Color is nice,
customer_reviews.text: Color is nice, shoes are not. Not comfortable at all. The fit across the toes, not good, the heel both on the bottom and in the back not comfortable. I did not try them in the water, or on the boat, I only walked around house for 10 minutes in them, and toes hurt. Toes were even red across the middle. This was a Today Deal, but, "savings of 17, but still $17.99 wasted. I am donating them today, hopefully someone can find a better use for them.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use as my camp shoes when thru-hiking the JMT. I love them! They come in at less than half a pound for the pair (.44 lbs for size 7), are extremely breathable, and comfy. The only negatives I have is that they do pick up rocks and pebbles frequently so they require some effort to get those out and also if you step on damp/soggy ground it will pull the moisture up and get your socks wet. Now that I'm off trail I'm still wearing these around as day to day shoes and I'm continually getting compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Love these except for some
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes in every way so sad to have to return them but the fabric under the tongue is rough and feels a bit uncomfortable as soon as I out them on and continues. They look as pictured. They fit great and I have a wide toe box with narrow heal. They have a nice sole. I do have a bit of a higher instep so not positive if this what is causing the discomfort but it seems more that the shoe is rough in that area so rubs on the foot. It’s not horrible but item there. I tried wearing them around the house to see if it would pass but it didn’t
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Run a little big but super comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a trip where we participated in a lot of water activity and they worked great, looked cute and were comfortable. Didn’t come in half sizes and ended up having to go a size down because 7’s ran big but 6 worked well. Thought they fit a little wide but I have a narrow foot. Love these and take to the beach all the time but sand does enter the shoe. Works if you have sensitive feet or your walking in water with sharp rocks, coral, etc. ✨If you found this review in any way useful, please hit the helpful button below and let Amazon know. Much appreciated✨
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok Water Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super cute, bit not super functional. My issue is that they are a bit wide for my very average width feet, and they don't stay on very well. If I step in mud or on slippery ground, the shoe comes off. I wore them on a rafting trip, and lost one as soon as I jumped in the water. If I wade through shallow water, they're mostly fine. Very annoying when rocks get stuck in the tread. I think shoe laces would fix the bulk of the issue, but I was really looking for a slip on. On a good note, the super cushy sole feels fantastic to walk on!
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish water shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shoes for land and water. They are actually stylish, unlike regular water shoes, looking like slip on trainers. I would not equate the support to regular walking shoes, but I walked a long distance in complete comfort. I am planning on ordering another color. I would definitely recommend, if you are looking for a stylish, quick-drying water shoe.
customer_reviews.author: UberGirl814

customer_reviews.title: they quickly fill with sand and thus get very heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: they quickly fill with sand and thus get very heavy thus you can't walk in them on a sandbar. Maybe ok for walking in the water or on wet sand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kohman

customer_reviews.title: Dry quickly and offer protection while walking
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased these for use on a boat, but haven't been able to do that yet. They worked great on a walk near the marina and did terrific while I was doing a very wet job. The shoes dried quickly and didn't have any 'crunchy ' feel post drying. I definitely like these better than my traditional water shoes. They would be great on a wet hike, but bugs, tiny sticks and goo may be able to get you through the very airy soles. They are a little high in the back, but I have small feet. I am very glad I have these as part of my footwear lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Toughteach

customer_reviews.title: Great product made with quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of these dark grey pair compared to the rest of the colors because I can imagine wearing them with any outfit while I’m doing any water activities. I am a size 8.5 and got them in a 8.5, I don’t plan on wearing socks in these while in water activities so they’re a bit loose but still fit & do not slip off. I think the shoes look great & were made great. It’s winter now & traveling will be in a few months, I hope my testament then will be just as great as first impression.
customer_reviews.author: KittKatt

customer_reviews.title: These are great and original color fading
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love these water shoes. They fit well and are extremely comfortable. I wear them daily for water aerobics. As soon as I return from the pool everything goes into the machine for a quick wash to remove any chlorine. After just a couple of weeks, the cording on the shoes is beginning to bleach out which I don't care for. The color on the cording matched the soles on the shoes and now it's changing. It seems as though a different fabric could be used that doesn't lose it's color as rapidly. I am disappointed about this one aspect. Otherwise, the shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decently priced water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to the beach in these. They were perfect in the airport. Then once at the beach they were perfect to go on hikes that we had to trek through water while hiking. Dried pretty quickly. Only complaint that other reviewers had mentioned is that smaller particles of sand and smaller rocks do end up in the shoe. Other larger rocks get stuck in the holes on the bottom of the shoe. I got lazy after returning from out trip and haven’t dug the rocks out of the holes yet. Even with this complaint, I still like the shoes and plan to take them on my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: These fit nice to a bit loose
customer_reviews.text: I just got them. They are not tight. I saw photos that they left marks on the feet because they where tight. I weight 130 5'9 with normal feet. Narrow tends to hurt me and wide is too wide. These fit nice to a bit loose. So I would say they are a touch wide. I wear size 8 dress shoes and tennis shoes size 9. These are 8. These fit well. I could go 8.5 for more room on top as these don't have much space. But in water, shoes tend to loosen, have drag and fall off, so I feel I would like the more glove fit therefore I will stick with the 8.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Backus

customer_reviews.title: Good but order normal size and 1/2 size down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my Thailand trip and will update when I return. I wanted something breathable and easy to dry just in case it rains. I’m a 6.5 and I bought the 6 and 6.5. The 6 was too small, I couldn’t even get my foot in the shoe. The 6.5 was a little big, without socks my feet was “loose” with socks it fit nicely-with room to swell in the heat. They look like regular tennis so that’s a plus. Note, initially bought the black stylish color but in the photo the rubber bottoms look white but in reality it’s a light grey or silver color. I opted for the all black ones.
customer_reviews.author: S.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a St Lucia trip, where I would be hiking on slick rocks up a waterfall. The shoes outperformed my $100 Keens. I ended up wearing them everywhere I needed traction, as the entire island was wet and slippery. And, they looked super cute on my feet. They do run a little big, though. I usually wear an 8.5, but, followed the advice of others and bought an 8, which was perfect. You will have to dig out small pebbles from the holes that allow water to flow freely through the bottom, but, it was easy enough to do at the end of the day and didn't cause any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, chic, slip on water shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these last week and got them today, a day earlier than expected. I ordered the color “power pink” in a size 7. I usually wear 6 1/2 - 7 in ladies. The 7s feel perfect! They are easy to slip on and have amazing squishy and comfortable heel support. They do have an insole that looks removable so I’m curious to see how it handles in water. I haven’t done a water test run yet but I will re-edit this review when I do. The color is perfect, like a soft coral color. They are so comfy wearing around the house too. I love them! I hope they handle well in the river.
customer_reviews.author: MJ-U

customer_reviews.title: Not for shelling, but good for regular beaches and rocky areas
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes about two years ago for shelling. The holes on the bottom and the mesh design work great for finer sand and even rounded rocks. However, they aren't great for shell beaches like Sanibel island. Small shell fragments worked themselves into the shoes nearly immediately from the bottom, sides, and top. My feet were in real bad shape. Anyway, I would definitely use these shoes on regular sand or rocky beaches, but never again for shelly areas. They fit well and are durable, so I think they will last many seasons. If you have wider feet, size up if you can. After exposed to wet-dry cycles, the material seems to shrink a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Drains well
customer_reviews.text: It fits looser than I expected and I was afraid it wouldn't stay on for water aerobics, but it actually seemed to cling to my foot once wet. Stayed on fine thru all the kicking around. I liked that water seemed to drain through well which decreased resistance compared to previous shoes. It is pretty light I wouldn't think it would work for a hike in river beds or even sandy beach but is a good water aerobics shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jaki

customer_reviews.title: Great beach shoe for long walks
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES! They fit my wide, high-instep, hard-to-fit feet, are cute as can be, and were the perfect shoes for a week-long beach vacation. We walked 10+ beach miles a day, and my feet felt great. Yes, they can pick up small pebbles in the sole, but that doesn’t affect comfort, and those pebbles can be removed at the end of the day. They pick up some sand, but that’s easily dealt with at day’s end as well. My only wish is that they would dry faster, but I bought 2 pairs in order to trade them out when one got wet. Would absolutely buy them again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I was recommended this brand by a friend who wore them hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this brand by a friend who wore them hiking in Hawaii. My daughter and I got this water shoe for vacation in Mexico. The fit was perfect and the shoe didn't rub or cause blisters after being in and out of sand and water for 7 days. My husband got the men's tennis shoe version and received lots of compliments during our trip.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfy, and stylish water shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. My bf and I bought them for a trip to PR and they did not disappoint. I ordered the stylish black shoe and they look great on my feet. I wear a 9.5 in shoe and I ordered a 9.5. Fit perfectly! The cushioning was better than I expected it to be and I sometimes wear them for a quick trip to the store. Some cons but not deal breakers: When wet sand gets into the shoes it does feel like you're walking with concrete bricks on your feet. Also, small rocks do tend to get stuck in the holes of the sole. No big deal, just pull them out. I will definitely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Roc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these almost 2 weeks, and have worn them daily. I love the mesh material for keeping my feet cool. The are super light weight. I have enjoyed wearing them in the house as well as outside around the farm. They have gotten wet and dirty and easily wipe clean. They run true to size, and the color was as shown in the picture. I highly recommend these shoes for any and all purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up! Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Loving these. Climbed Dunns River Falls in them yesterday. They had great grip and were super comfortable. They look cute too. Off on another adventure today and they are completely dry and ready to go. Only negative is that a small amount of fine gravel gets inside the shoe but not enough to deter me from recommending or buying again myself. A few small rocks get stuck in the holes in the sole but they didnt make a difference to comfort and were easy to pick out at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Naideen Paine

customer_reviews.title: Best water shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these water shoes! I bought them for my daughter and myself when went to the mountains so we could go rafting and tubing in the river without having to carry an extra pair of shoes everywhere. I ended up wearing them all the time while I was there because they were so versatile and comfortable. They dry quickly and feel a lot like regular athletic shoes. I wore them all day everyday for a week of walking, tubing, rafting, and hiking to waterfalls and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: sillysongbird

customer_reviews.title: Great for rainy days at amusement parks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at Disney World during the rainy season. They were THE BEST, I wish I would have gotten this idea earlier. They provide pretty good support (I have flat feet, of course I should wear the orthopedic inserts but they aren't for use in water...) and when it rained I even played in the puddles. They pretty much dry in one night. The only downside is that in my thicker foot (old ankle injury) the back of the shoe was rubbing my skin and I had to lower it and step over it like a sandal. It was still worth it. Totes recommend, mainly for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Macky

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our honeymoon cruise and it was a great purchase. They held up well walking on land and in water. They hold some sand even after you think you've gotten it all out - but just keep them in a container or bag to keep the sand out of your suitcase. I'm a size 10 and these fit like perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet! Love these for my narrow feet though!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live these shoes! I use them for the dog park and then I hose them off before I leave. These shoes are snug! I wouldn’t recommend if you have wide feet. I Normally wear 8.5 and I ordered an 8.5. They fit without any extra room at all. Which is fine for me. I have narrow feet so it works out. Definitely wouldn’t be able to wear socks with these. I could probably get away with wearing a 9 in these if I wanted a little more room.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Leja

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style / comfort... Run a size to small
customer_reviews.text: Love the style & comfort level!!!! My daughter & I usually wear a 9.5 so I thought a 9 would work well for a water sock. Unfortunately the 9.5 size was sold out so believed we’d be better off going with a half size smaller rather than larger. I ended up returning both 9’s because the fit way to well, almost to small. Order us both 10s - Surprisingly they fit my daughter well & I could actually use a 10.5 but will be fine with 9.5 considering they’re water socks. I wouldn’t agree with the 80% fit to size percentage - We’d day they run a size to small.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Preister

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7 wide and this fit as expected. It was really comfortable wearing on the sand and to walk on the ground with. It's sturdy and breathes well. When you have sand in it it's a little difficult to take it out, but with some effort it cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A wear anywhere shoe
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I found these courtesy of an online review site (sorry, can’t remember where) and like them so much, I wear them all around town. These slip-ons are very comfortable and lightweight—the next best thing to barefoot. One caveat—I gleefully remembered that they are water shoes when walking on a boggy trail. They let water in too, so I discovered that the soles are actually holes. No matter, that’s why Ibought them and they dried quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Comes in Half Sizes! Great water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8.5 and this fits perfect. My foot is somewhat narrow so I'm not sure how these would work on a wider foot. I bought these to use in the pool for water aerobics. They are comfortable in the water. The Tabs on the sides that holds the laces work great to keep the shoe in place and I really don't need to tighten the laces.I'm not sure if these would be comfortable for just for hiking as there is no cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: ktraveler2

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good! I usually wear size 6.5-7, depends on the shoes, if flip flops I wear 6.5 or 6, for sneakers I wear size 7. But this waterproof shoes I got the size 6, because I like the color it's white and pink. They only got size 6 left, so I was worried if it might be small on me, but no! Size 6 is just perfect fit! Looks nice and comfortable, good cushion feel. A little rubber smell but I don't mind, it will go away for couples days I think. Overall I'm happy with it.:)
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying and also very supportive!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful water shoes!!! They have a nice tight fit to keep them on during water aerobics and they dry quickly as you would expect. The surprise is how supportive and cushioning these are!!! There is a nice thick bottom with great arch support that makes them perfect for indoor wearing also! I’m a teacher and on my feet all day - wore these to school last week and literally felt like I was walking on a cloud all day!
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and design. Rocks are trapped under the sole, making its very uncomfortable. During my trip, I had to constantly stop and pick the rocks out. Some were too difficult to dig out. I attached the photo of the shoes after just one use. I went rafting, so I only walked on these shoes for few hours, but they already look old and you can see some rocks still trapped there.
customer_reviews.author: Quan Bui

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these water shoes. They allow me to jump off a boat and land securely. They allow me to jump from rock to rock with no problem. In other words they are much more like a sneaker than like a flimsy water shoe. I would not suggest you hike for long periods in them and I would not suggest you use them as a regular sneaker. But they are good in the water and to do water things. I use them to paddle board and they are perfect! I"m happy with my purchase. I've already washed them over five times and they have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Rubbed Back of Heel Raw
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a vacation we went on last summer to Hawaii. When I first tried them on they seemed to fit and were not uncomfortable. However, when actually using them, they rubbed the back of my heels raw. I ended up using my comfortable waterproof strappy terra float Teva sandals instead for the rest of the trip (should have done that to begin with). Oh well, lesson learned. Please learn from my mistake and DO NOT BUY! These are cheap for a reason!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney George

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes- Wore all day
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable, light weight and dry quick. Bought to wear on our excursions to Mexico since some of the beaches we were going to were rocky. I wore them off the cruise ship, in the water, while we shopped and back on the ship. We did a lot of walking and WILL NOT wear uncomfortable shoes, but these were great for all day wear. They look like you are wearing tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Fens

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product 2x now and I am about to buy it again. I wear them out, because they are my go to shoes. They are designed for use in water, but they are so light weight, flexible, and easily slips on and off, I just wear them for comfort and efficiency. Socks or no socks, wet, dry, everywhere. They start to stink, I just throw them in the washer, no problem. My family members also saw them on me and loved them. Now they all have a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe - and not just for water! I bought these for travel to Thailand, and they were perfect - from water and beach to just walking around on a hot day, these shoes were comfortable, breathable, and dried quickly when wet. The holes are big enough for sand to easily make its way back out of the shoes. A few friends on the trip equally appreciated them as water shoes, so plural thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my trip to Havasupai since there's a lot of water crossings and waterfalls that can be slippery. They were great! Suuper comfortable and they dried really quickly overnight. I even wear these around as normal shoes now that my trip is over since they're so comfortable. My only tip is: maybe don't wear them actually hiking for miles because they really tore up my feet after wearing them on a 6 mile hike. If this review was helpful, please click the helpful button. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use for camping activities because I had the water socks last year and when it came to riding bikes, paddle boats, walking, etc- the ball of my foot, my knees and lower back were killing me. I chose these as a sturdier swim shoe, when I tried them on and walked around, jumped around, etc- it feels like you're walking around on a sneaker, yet light weight enough to swim with. I love it! ONLY downfall- I recommend following your REGULAR shoesize, because mine came a little too big at toe, because I measured and followed the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am inlove with this! This is a really great quality shoe! I don't understand the negative reviews because this really is wonderful! It fits perfectly! I got a size 9 and my size is usually a size 9. I've used it to water amusement parks countless of times and it does it's job. It dries off a couple minutes later. The only downside I would say is that after you use it so many times, try and clean it because when you use it when it's dirty, your feet will smell. I used this on my trip to Catalina Island. We dipped our feet in water for a bit and then hiked some mountains. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jhessabel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear paddle boarding. They are great, really comfy and easy on off. They do get sand in them but no more so than my Keen's. They are not meant for long distance walking, as they don't have much support and the sole is thin so you feel every rock and pebble. They are great for walking about a mile or 2 at most, they don't have as good of grip as my Keen's but I was happy with them and didn't slip anywhere when walking around on wet rocks or the shore line. Little rocks do get stuck in the sole but they are easy to pop out. I am really happy with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Swarthout

customer_reviews.title: from Belize to Banff, these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES!! it’s crossed my mind to buy them in every color on multiple occasions. I bought them to wear cave tubing in Belize and they were perfect. I also wore them hiking and climbing a mountain in the Canadian rockies. They dry quickly and don’t rub when they’re wet. They do pick up a lot of stones in the big drainage holes in the sole. They’re really easy to clean between adventures too- a little soap and hot water and they’re good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and easy to wear. Used for kayaking on some really hot days this summer. Were great for that - water came in and out, but dried fast and were comfortable even soaking wet. The only thing that didn't work for me is that a lot of rocks get stuck in the treads - it seems all too easily - we have a gravel driveway - and then they are hard to get out, as the tread material is pliable and soft. You can't just "flick" them out with a key - you have to really dig them out.
customer_reviews.author: Liv'in Learn

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes as well as being comfortable, easy to pack and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Looked for water shoes for both my husband and I. These had great (and well deserved) reviews - and the shoes were less expensive than others I had been looking at. They were very comfortable as soon as we put them on and we found them to be very easy to pack for trips and quick-drying. They look so good, my husband wears his when he needs to wear "shoes" at events - you can't tell they're water shoes. They're easy to put on and take off. We are very pleased with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been suffering with my old swim shoes and decided I'm done with the pain and bought these! When I got them I put them on and used them as my walking shoes for a week before heading to the beach. My friends freaked out when they saw me run into the water with these suckers on because they just assumed it was normal shoes. At the beach, the shoe was amazing! It dried quickly and it was fairly easy to get all the sand out which is an impressive feat to me. I continue to use them as walking shoes because they're surprisingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: If you have a high arch, these may be uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my water aerobics classes. I was pleased when I received them, although I had misgivings about the fit due to my high arch. I was right - they are too tight, and when I do a lot of back-to-back classes, I really feel them digging into the top of my feet. I'd not wear them for long periods, due to the discomfort. If you don't have high arches, though, I'd say you will be pleased with this shoe. They do dry quickly, are otherwise comfortable, and are cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, soft and the water just runs right out, no soggy feet!
customer_reviews.text: I was super scared to order any kind of shoe online because I am not the best shopper... but these came in really fast, and they fit perfect! I wear between a womans size 7.5 and an 8 depending on the shoe... I ordered smaller because I wanted them to fit tightly so they stay on while swimming and I am glad I did... if I would have got an 8 then would have been too big. They are good quality and I am really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Andie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe but keeps pebbles inside the holes of the sole
customer_reviews.text: This water shoe was great but when I used it to hike through pebbly terrain it got stuck in the holes of the sole. Still it didn’t prevent its usefulness & worked well at the beach and other locations. The grip was good too when the floor was slippery from rain. I wonder if I can wash them in the machine? It’s a great shoe for holidays in the Caribbean or cruises etc.
customer_reviews.author: SAFFY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water shoes for a rafting trip
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these water shoes. Fit perfectly & drained water exactly as expected. I wore them in the river on a rafting day. My favorite part of them is the thicker sole. More like a tennis shoe but with drainage holes in the bottoms. The extra support was awesome and the thickness made it easier when we stepped on larger rocks as the really thin water shoes can’t protect against those. Really kept my feet from getting poked from the rocks. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Tighe

customer_reviews.title: So far, amazing
customer_reviews.text: My gym's pool bottom is horribly rough and the shoes are a perfect remedy. The quick drying feature is also great. I live not dripping all over the place on my way back to the car. I've only used them for a week so far and hopefully they'll last much longer than all the other brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes to wear while river tubing and they did great. The upper material is basically a light plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear while river tubing and they did great. The upper material is basically a light plastic material that easiky drains so shoes do not get heavy with water. These were quite easy to slide on and off. While they stayed in place for me, if there had been a stronger current or mud I think they would have slipped off. One con is that after being in the water for hours, these shoes seeemed to rub on my skin more than normal making them uncomfortable until they dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Heebeejeebees

customer_reviews.title: I am convinced that it's the best $26 bucks I've spent in a very long time
customer_reviews.text: I ride scooter (50cc engine) scooters all summer long. I need to wear enclosed toe shoes for safety. My feet DIE in regular sneakers..sweat and stink!! I wasn't too excited to spend $26 on water shoes, but after wearing them just ONE time...I am convinced that it's the best $26 bucks I've spent in a very long time. The air flows through the top AND the bottom of the shoes. The sole of these shoes make them comfortable to wear when I'm off my scooter. I have yet to try them in water, I probably never will - unless I get caught in the rain while on my scooter. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe. Good for wearing when kayaking!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of these. They are reasonably priced and very functional as water shoes. We use them when we kayak so we don’t get foot injuries when launching or landing. Some folks have noted that smaller rocks and pebbles can become embedded in the honeycomb-like the sole pattern. This is true. But they can be picked out fairly easily. Run true to size and are size equivalent to a pair of Nike or Adidas running shoes, in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these, but I had to return them
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these, but I had to return them. They are simply too narrow for my feet. Not only is the width narrow, but also the height of the toe box and arch areas is very short. My feet were very squeezed. (I do have slightly wider feet, but not so wide that I wear wide width shoes.)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Don't slide off heels in water
customer_reviews.text: Wore today for first time doing water aerobics. Fit was a little tight getting on but I like the fit in the pool. Stayed in place in water; no slipping down heel which is what I wanted. Appear to be well made and I expect they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They are perfect for kayaking. I immediately bought a pair for my daughter. Order the size you normally do. They fit great, are very comfortable, and look very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wet hike
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a short canyoning hike up a river and hiking around a pebble beach. They were fantastic for going in and out of water and quite comfy. They do seem like they are going to wear out pretty quickly, but they are still a great deal for the price and totally worth it. I love how light they are, and the color is awesome. They do get pebbles stuck in the bottom, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Have you ever ordered a product and had it turn out a million times better than expected?
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever ordered something and had it turn out a million times better than you expected? That’s what happened with this pair of #watershoes I ordered for our trip. We were cautioned to get them for the Dalmatian Coast in Croatia. The water is crystal clear because their beaches are rocky, not sandy. And they have spiny sea urchins. I read reviews and finally selected Aleader Women’s Quick Drying shoes on Amazon. They are lightweight like slippers, and made of rubber and nylon for quick drying. They have some arch support and best of all they are cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lucille M. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hiking shoes for wet/water hikes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hike waterfalls so I could have arch support while hiking but also be able to wear them into the water and they are absolutely awesome. I have high arches/plantar fasciitis and I could hike all day in these (6+ miles) with no foot pain. Super lightweight and dry quick. Rocks will get suck in the treads but the shoes are so flexible they're easy to get out. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish...love
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to work out in the pool and was impressed by the stylish fit and comfort. Only drawback is they gave me blisters when I used them to walk on the beach (above achilles tendon ) from fabric rubbing the bony area but could be because it's little big on me. I wear 7 or 7.5 depending on the brand width and I think these run normal to wide so should have ordered 7 instead of 7.5 . However, no issues when I use them in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: S.J. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: We do hikes that often end at cooling off in streams, lakes, and creeks with rocks that can tear up your feet. I bought these thinking they'd be used for hiking and water. I do not recommend. I have blisters just after one use. I tried using them again weeks later, and same thing- blisters on my heels. I ordered another brand off Amazon that are way more flexible and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They are so great for travel and warm months. Whenever we do a big vacation with many activities (especially water activities), I bring these. I walked all over Havana in these and not once did my feet get tired or hurt. I wouldn't recommend that completely because the are water shoes so there are holes all over them and my feet were filthy afterward but really great shoes for traveling. They are compact and light and squish down so they don't take a lot of space in your suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie M. Aronson

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: So these were perfect for the occasion. Bought these to tour the Niagara Falls. I knew we would get ponchos, but what about our shoes?! These fit the bill. We wore them all day without socks and went from standing under the Falls to the street, back to the boat under the Falls and back to the street. These things did it all. The ONLY downside to these is that gravel do get lodged in the bottoms, which can be irritating. So I wouldn’t recommend hiking on gravel in these.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I had them on my feet for maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I had them on my feet for maybe 5 minutes and they seem to fit true to size. They are very cute, and seem like they would be comfortable EXCEPT that the mesh at the base of the tongue is left raw on the inside of the shoe and it feels EXTREMELY scratchy... like someone took the bristles off my potato scrubber and put them in my shoe. Maybe it wouldn't feel so scratchy once it gets wet, but I'll be returning them rather than trying to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by these. Not only do they double as water shoes and regular sneakers, but they're so much cuter than normal water shoes! I wore these for 2 weeks on the big island of Hawaii and saw all types of terrain- ocean, sand, gravel, mud, rocks etc and these held up! It was so cool to be able to hike along the water and not worry about my feet getting wet or rocks/hard terrain being uncomfortable. I'm not the type of person to walk around barefoot so my soles are pretty sensitive, and I didn't feel anything through these. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: More uses than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I took out the useless elastic laces and threaded real laces through so I could tighten the shoe. They are great in water and on rocks, stones, and ground. I also do a lot of weightlifting and these proved to be the best shoes I have worn for deadlifts and squats, also for Erg (Concept 2 rowing) - nice surprise as crossfit and lifting shoes cost a lot. I can throw these away when worn and replace. A good shoe. I will probably buy another pair, maybe try a size down as I have narrow feet and these were a little looser than I like.
customer_reviews.author: Condor Reads

customer_reviews.title: Endured the hurricane!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for five days straight during Hurricane Florence. A lot of walking inside and outside during the hurricane, and these shoes were so comfortable and held up strong. I also wore them deep sea fishing, and also as a casual tennis shoe. Obviously, I had to wash them four times to get the smell out, but they held up perfectly. Initially, I did not want to spend $30 on water shoes, but I'm hooked on these, and if/when they do give out, I'm definitely buying more! True to size and very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Too wide of a fit for me - AND - no quick & simple adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Good price point and cute color. However, they were a bit too loose on my feet & there is no easy way to adjust the elastic "laces" that are stitched in place under each eyelet. Rather than return the aqua shoes, I decided to try tightening the elastic and restitching each of the "laces" down one side of each shoe. That worked ok. However, these could be better with some sort of regular corded laces and a small shoelace toggle/lock to adjust them. Really, even regular shoelaces that adjust and tie would have been an improvement to the fit of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit, style, and utility!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent trip to Maui and wore them when we did the road to Hana and black sand beaches in a torrential downpour. They were awesome! If you have a wider foot they might be tricky though. I usually wear a medium width,but gravitate towards brands that run narrow for my comfort. These were in line with what I would expect the width of Nike sneakers to be, perfect for me and just enough arch to be adequate. I purchased a grey pair when I got home for summer kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dry fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I took them on a backpacking trip to Havasupai, where there are a lot of waterfalls and streams. I didn't wear them for the 10 mile hike with my backpacking backpack, but I did wear them for a 5ish mile side-hike with my daypack. I wore hiking socks for the trail, then took off the socks and wore only the shoes to ford across streams. The shoes were comfortable the whole time, and dried fairly quickly. I never worried about slipping because the grip is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These Aleader shoes are so comfortable I'm using them for everyday shoes. A little concerned re little arch support, even ankles feel vulnerable. But I love the feel of walking in them. They're a cross between moccasins and lite walking shoe. The rubber sole holes give them airy flexibility. It feels like every bone in my foot move which feels wonderful to me. I may wear them out faster but enjoy every step.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced as...

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a trip to the Bahamas. I wore them there, at a lake, camping, and in Mexico now. This might be my all time favorite Amazon purchase. I have received countless compliments (I got the coral ones). I freaking love them and I race about them to anyone near me each time I wear them. Super excited that at the water park I was able to keep them on and didn't have to bother with holding my flip flops during the water rides. Went from land to beach to pool and everything smoothly. Love them and I will never buy another water shoes again...
customer_reviews.author: alma romero

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some shoes to walk in the rainforest in Puerto Rico last year and got these - I am super pleased with the purchase! Comfortable enough to wear all day, quick-drying as stated in the name, and they look pretty cute and grip wet rocks/sidewalk well! I have been wearing them to drive to the beach, and it's great to not have to change my shoes after getting out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rg223

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today. I use my shoes for comfortable/casual daily wear. I have a couple of casual looking water shoes that I like that I go to amusement parks in and take traveling with me because they are super light and comfortable. So far they are super comfortable (even without socks they feel fine) and I can’t usually wear shoes with any support (so I wear a lot of flat shoes like vans and converse or just flip flops) but these seem to have a little support but don’t cause me any pain which usually I feel pain within 5 minutes of standing. Overall I’m really liking these shoes and they do run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Fits perfectly and super cute. I do worry that the eyelets are metal so they may rust after I get them wet. They are also mesh and super stretchy so I wonder if they will stretch after they get wet. First impression no complaints. I will follow up after I try them out. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Angie Starr

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting your true size to me comfortable for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down based on reviews but wish I didn't. I am usually a size 7.5 and ordered a 7. I took this to Hawaii w me and didn't have time for an exchange so it was snug but still made it work. I would recommend getting your true size to me comfortable for the extra couple of hours adventures and activities. Took this for snorkeling, hiking, and all the above. Overall highly Recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the parks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for each family member for our Disney trip. They are lightweight, comfortable and perfect for water rides or walking in the rain. Also great to slip on to go to the pool. There isn't a lot of support in them per say, although I didn't mind wearing them for an entire day of walking (one picture is of the girls wearing them for the day, they wore them with socks other picture is just my got with my husband's showing how much they just look like a sneaker) I did carry them most days in the backpack and we would switch into them for water rides or when weather turned to rain. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good traction
customer_reviews.text: I was warned to make sure my aqua shoes have good traction and these are very good. I have wide feet so I ordered a size larger than normal as I didn’t want them to be tight. The material is stretchy so I probably would have been fine with my regular size. I hardly felt them on my feet my first time in the pool. So far I love them!
customer_reviews.author: DPerkowski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I tested these shoes out wandering my house and they fit so dang good and finally my trip to the lake came. Sipped these beauties on and the sand would just come out and my shoes was sand free. Now rocks can get stuck in the holes on the bottom but the can easily be picked out. And they are a bit itchy on the top mesh when you first put them on. These are a great investment for water activities. Shipped super fast and arrived secure. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water shoe! I wore it every day for 2 weeks in the salt water of the Pacific, some walks of multiple miles in the sand. The design allows the water to flow out so well. There was never any “drag”. The other review which mention the small rocks collecting in some of the holes on the bottom are correct, but it was easy enough to flick them out. I was most impressed, though, by how comfortable and supportive they were. Like wearing regular tennis shoes. Would definitely buy another pair of these!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for my foot!
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to try this shoe in the water. It fits very well on a narrow foot. The tab did not have to be pulled very far, for it to fit well. Looks great in person and is very light. The bottom of the shoe is very smooth not sure how it would do climbing a waterfall or wet rocks. Product video posted with Zhuanglin 3,251 Women's Quick Drying Aqua Water Shoe Reviewing both shoes and compairing them. Only 4 stars because I haven’t tested it in the water yet. Can’t wait to test them in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin’ Blonde

product_meta.title: Aleader Women's Quick Drying Aqua Water Shoes
feature_bullets: Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe
Solyte midsole provides an exceptionally lightweight midsole with excellent bounce-back and durability
Water Drain outsole provides exceptional traction in wet and slippery conditions
ComforDry sockliner provides the optimum cushioning performance that creates a cooler, drier and healthier shoe environment.
Open mesh on the upper and hole on the sole provides for superior breathability and quick drying
